text: U. A. Khader (1935–12 December 2020) was an Burmese-born Indian writer. He published in Malayalam such as novels. His works have been translated to many languages including English, Hindi and Kannada. Khader was born in Bilin, Rangoon, Burma. Khader's first story was published in Chandrika weekly in 1953."U.A. Khader, in his own words" . The Hindu. Retrieved 24 February 2019. He was the president of Purogamana Kala Sahitya Sangham. Khader died on 12 December 2020 at a hospital in Calicut, Kerala at the age of 85.യു.എ. ഖാദര്‍ അന്തരിച്ചു; 'തൃക്കോട്ടൂര്‍ പെരുമ' ഇനി ചരിത്രം ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian novelists Category:Burmese people Category:Malayali people
title: U. A. Khader
